GameItemType.Description: This cursed axe is lethal to allies and enemies around the wielder.

GameModifier.Provides: This cursed axe is lethal to allies and enemies around the wielder.
::: Cleave ::: ::: Strikes up to 3 adjacent enemies
::: Clumsy ::: ::: Randomly strikes ally or enemy
::: Warrior Axe ::: ::: +2 Initiative ::: +15% Cleave Bonus ::: Applied in Tactical if Warrior

GameItemType.Description: Made from the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

GameModifier.Provides: Made from the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

GameItemType.Description: This bell was hung with a string down into a grave, so that those accidently buried alive could be found. But when hundreds started ringing at once, they knew it was far worse than someone buried alive.

GameModifier.Provides: This bell was hung with a string down into a grave, so that those accidently buried alive could be found. But when hundreds started ringing at once, they knew it was far worse than someone buried alive.
::: Cursed Bell ::: ::: ALL lose next Action ::: Caster loses next Action ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: Victims of this weapon's attack cannot cast spells, or cry for help.

GameModifier.Provides: Victims of this weapon's attack cannot cast spells, or cry for help.
::: Silence Effect ::: ::: Target can't cast for 1 Action ::: Resistable
::: Assassin Dagger ::: ::: +5 Critical Chance ::: +25% Critical Damage ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Assassin

GameItemType.Description: It's a fairly unassuming knife, but each strike weakens the victim a little more, and makes the next strike that much more deadly.

GameModifier.Provides: It's a fairly unassuming knife, but each strike weakens the victim a little more, and makes the next strike that much more deadly.
::: Assassin Dagger ::: ::: +5 Critical Chance ::: +25% Critical Damage ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Assassin

GameItemType.Description: Throw them onto the ground and Skeleton's will rise to serve you.

GameModifier.Provides: Throw them onto the ground and Skeleton's will rise to serve you.
::: Dragon Teeth ::: ::: Can raise 3 Skeletons ::: Level = Summon Bonus + 1

GameItemType.Description: Made of skath fins and enchanted to retain some of that creatures deadly power.

GameModifier.Provides: Made of skath fins and enchanted to retain some of that creatures deadly power.
::: Marksman Bow ::: ::: +4 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Marksman

GameItemType.Description: Enchanted to bestow the speed of the stag, made for an archer who wants to fire early and often.

GameModifier.Provides: Enchanted to bestow the speed of the stag, made for an archer who wants to fire early and often.
::: Marksman Bow ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Marksman

GameItemType.Description: Even those that don't believe in luck reach for their favorite d6 when the game is on the line.

GameModifier.Provides: Even those that don't believe in luck reach for their favorite d6 when the game is on the line.

GameItemType.Description: We make holes in teeth!

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Sugar Rush ::: ::: +100% ATK but lose next action
::: Bash ::: ::: May knock target prone ::: Chance (%) = DMG/100
::: Commander Hammer ::: ::: +5 Initiative ::: +1 Counterattack per Action ::: Applied in Tactical if Commander

GameItemType.Description: How many battlefields have these boots tread across?

GameModifier.Provides: How many battlefields have these boots tread across?
::: Blood God Armor ::: ::: 2x Blood God Armor DMG

GameItemType.Description: When her heels were dug in, Lady Umber was unlikely to be moved. These boots cannot be worn by men.

GameModifier.Provides: When her heels were dug in, Lady Umber was unlikely to be moved. These boots cannot be worn by men.

GameItemType.Description: A cage of pain funnels the rage of the wearer, until it is set free.

GameModifier.Provides: A cage of pain funnels the rage of the wearer, until it is set free.
::: Anguish ::: ::: 8 DMG to ALL adjacent units ::: 4 DMG to the wearer

GameItemType.Description: Because of this cuirass Lady Umber was rumored to be invulnerable to mortal attacks. This cuirass cannot be worn by men.

GameModifier.Provides: Because of this cuirass Lady Umber was rumored to be invulnerable to mortal attacks. This cuirass cannot be worn by men.

GameItemType.Description: Cursed greaves bound in the prayers of the faithless.

GameModifier.Provides: Cursed greaves bound in the prayers of the faithless.
::: Blood God Armor ::: ::: 2 DMG to attacker ::: 1 DMG to wearer

GameItemType.Description: These greaves are powerful on their own, but in combination with Lady Umber's cuirass it makes the wearer nearly invulnerable. These greaves cannot be worn by men.

GameModifier.Provides: These greaves are powerful on their own, but in combination with Lady Umber's cuirass it makes the wearer nearly invulnerable. These greaves cannot be worn by men.

GameItemType.Description: When the helm is worn, the sounds of iron on flesh and the battlefield cries become, for a time, distant and quiet.

GameModifier.Provides: When the helm is worn, the sounds of iron on flesh and the battlefield cries become, for a time, distant and quiet.
::: Blood God Armor (Wearer) ::: ::: Nullifies Blood God Armor DMG

GameItemType.Description: "I am the mountain, and though storms rage about me, I will not fall." -Inscription in the Silver Helm.

GameModifier.Provides: "I am the mountain, and though storms rage about me, I will not fall." -Inscription in the Silver Helm.

GameItemType.Description: These vambraces cut into the skin of the wearer, but its enchantment passes along this pain to all you touch.

GameModifier.Provides: These vambraces cut into the skin of the wearer, but its enchantment passes along this pain to all you touch.
::: Blood God Armor ::: ::: 2 DMG to target ::: 1 DMG to wearer

GameItemType.Description: Though these bladed vambraces were made for battle, Lady Umber was fond of using them against servents and lovers as well. These vambraces cannot be worn by men.

GameModifier.Provides: Though these bladed vambraces were made for battle, Lady Umber was fond of using them against servents and lovers as well. These vambraces cannot be worn by men.

GameItemType.Description: A storm rages inside this bottle. There is no safe way to let it out.

GameModifier.Provides: A storm rages inside this bottle. There is no safe way to let it out.
::: Bottled Wind ::: ::: ALL are knocked prone ::: Caster is knocked prone ::: Applies to all within a 1 radius ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: Quicksilver spins in the bottle, never slowing.

GameModifier.Provides: Quicksilver spins in the bottle, never slowing.
::: Quicksilver Potion ::: ::: Get 3 Actions immediately ::: May lose several Actions subsequently

GameItemType.Description: The ultimate reward of suffering is knowing we can survive it.

GameModifier.Provides: The ultimate reward of suffering is knowing we can survive it.

GameItemType.Description: The ultimate reward of suffering is in returning it on our enemies.

GameModifier.Provides: The ultimate reward of suffering is in returning it on our enemies.

GameItemType.Description: With proper training a soldier can respond immediately to his commander, with this scroll the training isn't required.

GameModifier.Provides: With proper training a soldier can respond immediately to his commander, with this scroll the training isn't required.
::: Battle Cry Scroll ::: ::: ALL allies act immediately ::: May lose Actions subsequently

GameItemType.Description: "Cage and chain, rage and pain. Whatever is bound within, will never be free again." -Quendar nursery rhyme.

GameModifier.Provides: "Cage and chain, rage and pain. Whatever is bound within, will never be free again." -Quendar nursery rhyme.
::: Imprison Scroll ::: ::: Immobilizes target ::: Inflicts 5 DMG per Action ::: Lasts for 5 Actions ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: "Quieter than a stalker's shadow, quieter than the night. Quieter than a politician's prayer or the morning's last starlight." -Silence Invocation

GameModifier.Provides: "Quieter than a stalker's shadow, quieter than the night. Quieter than a politician's prayer or the morning's last starlight." -Silence Invocation
::: Silence ::: ::: Target can't cast for 3 Actions ::: Resistable

GameItemType.Description: A masterwork shortbow crafted for young nobles, that they would learn from battle without being to close to it.

GameModifier.Provides: A masterwork shortbow crafted for young nobles, that they would learn from battle without being to close to it.
::: Marksman Bow ::: ::: +4 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Marksman

GameItemType.Description: The spider silk bowstring enchants arrows that are fired from it.

GameModifier.Provides: The spider silk bowstring enchants arrows that are fired from it.
::: Harridan ::: ::: Webs targets for 1 Action ::: Resistable
::: Marksman Bow ::: ::: +4 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Marksman

GameItemType.Description: A black staff of onyx enchanted in the depths of Deorcnysse.

GameModifier.Provides: A black staff of onyx enchanted in the depths of Deorcnysse.
::: Wizard Staff ::: ::: +5 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Wizard

GameItemType.Description: The petrified form of serpent, enchanted to spit venom.

GameModifier.Provides: The petrified form of serpent, enchanted to spit venom.
::: Summon ::: ::: Can summon a Naja ::: Level = 3
::: Wizard Staff ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: Applied in Tactical if Wizard

GameItemType.Description: There is more than magic imbued in this staff, there are generations of rituals, rites and prayers bound into the knotted wood.

GameModifier.Provides: There is more than magic imbued in this staff, there are generations of rituals, rites and prayers bound into the knotted wood.
::: Healing Light ::: ::: ((Level + 4) x2) HP ::: Applies to all adjacent Allies

GameItemType.Description: So sharp, it may take a victim a minute to realize he is dead.

GameModifier.Provides: So sharp, it may take a victim a minute to realize he is dead.
::: Ninja Sword ::: ::: +1 Initiative ::: +10% ATK ::: Applied in Tactical if Ninja
